nodes.text: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook is the official rulebook for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game, and included the complete adventure Trouble Brewing. It was released on July 5, 2013.
On October 11, 2013 the official FAQ and Errata was released that corrected errors and cleared up rules questions.

Participate in grim and gritty adventures in places where morality is gray and nothing is certain. Ply your trade as a smuggler in the Outer Rim, collect bounties on the scum that live in the shadows of Coruscant, or try to establish a new colony on a planet beneath the Empire's notice. The Star Wars universe is at your fingertips with the Star Wars: The Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, the heart and soul of your Edge of the Empire campaign. The 448-page Core Rulebook includes everything players and GMs need to begin their Star Wars roleplay campaign:
